import AdminLayout from './components/adminLayout'; import { Nav, Form, FormControl, Button, Spinner, Tab, Row, Col, } from "react-bootstrap" import MyStyle from '../styles/colorStyle'; import AdminStyleSheet from './adminStyleSheet'; import Vendors from './dashboard/vendors'; import Customers from './dashboard/customers'; import Products from './dashboard/products'; import Inventory from './dashboard/inventory'; import Discounts from './dashboard/discount'; import Commision from './dashboard/commision'; import Reports from './dashboard/reports'; import ProductCategories from './dashboard/product-categories'; const AdminDashboard = () => (
Vendors
Customers
Products
Categories
Inventory
Discounts
Commision
Reports
) export default AdminDashboard;
